TopicTitle: The Perfect Tower save file help

Articles.Content: Ok so i've been trying to figure out where the code part for the blueprints are at in the save file. I have edited a save file before from the game Trimps, but i used a save editor which is meant for the game Trimps. If anyone can help I would really appreciate it also here is the save file.     https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LLgz3BWfXzfWC3WywH0MInOa56UoasEWEQLvo2Ixv8s/edit?usp=sharing

I cannot find a KSP mod named "the perfect tower" so I guess you are talking about the game"the perfect tower" . You might want to ask that question in a "the perfect tower" forum/reddit, your chances to get help should be better there.
Thread moved to the Lounge, since it doesn't appear to be KSP-related. Good luck with your issue, though.

Just a base64-encoded binary.

Upd.
When decoded, it doesn't get more readable, btw.
